title: Rutabaga and Carrot Purée
directions: Cook rutabagas and carrots in boiling salted water to cover by 1 inch in a large pot until tender, about 30 minutes. Transfer vegetables with a slotted spoon to a food processor and purée with butter, brown sugar, and salt until very smooth. If necessary, transfer purée back to pot and reheat.
ingredients: 2 rutabagas (2 1/2 pounds total), peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
